膁膁膁

膁字的基本解释

膁
qiǎn
同“肷”。

膁字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiǎn］
［《廣韻》苦簟切，上忝，溪。］
(1)牲畜腰两侧肋与胯之间的虚软处。亦指人的腰部。
(2)扭动腰部。

膁字的康熙字典解释

【未集下】【肉字部】　膁； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页990第16
【廣韻】苦簟切，音嗛。腰左右虛肉處。　又【集韻】丘咸切，音鵮。牛馬肋後胯前。【正字通】凡畜腰後窊處曰膁窩。　又【集韻】乎韽切，音陷。餅中肉。與䭑同。　又牛廉切，音?。美也。　又【五音集韻】胡忝切，音鼸。大味。

膁字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
膁字的起名意思

暂无。

Fat
Basic explanation of words
Fat
qiǎn
Same as "肷".
Fat
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiǎn］
["Guangyun" bitter haircut, uphill, creek. ]
(1) The soft spots between the ribs and hips on both sides of the animal's waist. Also refers to the waist of a person.
(2) Twist the waist.
Fat
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Not set next] [Meat Character Department] 　膁; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 990 16
[Guang Yun] bitter 簟 cut, sound 嗛. Void flesh around the waist.　[Jiyun] Qiu Xianqie, sound 鵮. Beef and horse ribs in front of the crotch. 【Zhengzitong】The stubborn place at the back of the waist of the animal is called the stubborn nest.　[Jiyun] Almost 韽切, the sound is trapped. Meat in pie. Same as 䭑.　Niu Lianqie again, sound?. Beauty too.　[Pentagram Collection Rhyme] Hu Nianqie, Yin Yu. Big flavour.
Fat

Fat
Name meaning
Nothing.
qiǎn
〈名〉
牲畜腰两侧肋骨和胯骨之间的虚软处 the part between rib and hip (of animal)。 如: 膁皮(用兽类胸腹部和腋下的上等毛皮制成的皮制品)
